reviews.review_msg: As others have mentioned, the workload of this class is quite heavy and the percentages allocated to different assignments are a bit askew. However, Cristina is a very nice professor and is willing to help when necessary.

Ugh what can I say? She is a very nice professor but this particular class is tough to enjoy sometimes. Her "study notes" section feels unfair considering how much time you have to put into them each week. The content is a little boring and goes round and round sometimes in discussion. But always take something out of the class.

Cristina is very nice as a person but her workload is crazy. For this class, there were 6 three page essays, 2 nine page essays, a presentation, a poster, and attendance. She marks the small papers only A, C, or F. She also told me that since she has 60 students, she didn't have time to give me much feedback on my papers. Overall, hard class.
